meanings.sent1: She was the clumsiest dancer in the class.
meanings.sent2: The clumsiest student struggled with the art project.
meanings.sent3: The clumsiest chef in the kitchen kept dropping ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His clumsiest attempt at juggling ended in a mess of balls on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The clumsiest waiter tripped over his own feet, spilling drinks everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The clumsiest puppy tripped over its own tail.
meanings.sent2: She felt like the clumsiest person on the ice rink.
meanings.sent3: The clumsiest clown at the circus kept bumping into things.
meanings.sent4: His clumsiest dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The clumsiest acrobat wobbled on the tightrope, almost falling off.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of coordination or grace
meanings.sent1: The clumsiest child in the play kept forgetting their lines.
meanings.sent2: He was the clumsiest player on the soccer team.
meanings.sent3: The clumsiest mime in the show kept getting tangled in invisible ropes.
meanings.sent4: Her clumsiest attempt at painting resulted in a messy canvas.
meanings.sent5: The clumsiest gymnast stumbled during the routine, but managed to recover gracefully.
